text: High on Fire is an American heavy metal band. It was started by guitar player Matt Pike. He used to be in the band Asleep. The band has released 4 albums. ==Discography== ;Studio albums Year Album details Peak chart positions US Hard Rock Albums Independent Albums Tastemaker Albums Heatseekers Albums Top Rock Albums Billboard 200 Top Album Sales 2000 The Art of Self Defense * Released: February 7, 2000 * Label: Man's Ruin Records * Format: CD, LP, 2XLP, DL – – – – – – – 2002 Surrounded by Thieves * Released: March 28, 2002 * Label: Relapse Records * Format: CD, LP, 2XLP, DL – – – – – – – 2005 Blessed Black Wings * Released: February 1, 2005 * Label: Relapse Records * Format: CD, LP, 2XLP, DL – – – 40 – – – 2007 Death Is This Communion * Released: September 10, 2007 * Label: Relapse Records * Format: CD, LP, 2XLP, DL 22 18 10 2 – 142 – 2018 Electric Messiah * Released: October 5, 2018 * Label: E1 Music * Format: CD, LP, 2XLP, DL colspan="7" ==References== Category:American heavy metal bands Category:Musical groups from Oakland, California
